description.value:
Favored Weapons @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longsword}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-srd.Whip]{Whip}

Members of the Order of the Rack seek to eliminate wastefulness throughout the Inner Sea region. They seek to quash pointless dreams, quell rebellions, and destroy dangerous inventions.

Lesser Benefit @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Disillusionment]{Disillusionment}

Greater Benefit @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Silence Heresy]{Silence Heresy}
